title: Progress Comparison slot header redesign (Option banner + inline date/variance + Change button)

requirements.summary: Redesign each compare slot header to start with a full-width top banner reading “Option 1/2/3”, using harmonious but distinct outline colors aligned to existing dark theme tokens.
acceptanceCriteria: Each compare slot header displays a full-width banner at the top that says exactly “Option 1”, “Option 2”, or “Option 3”.
The banner uses an outline (not fill) and Option 1/2/3 each has a distinct, visually harmonious outline color.
The updated banner styling does not break readability/contrast in the app’s forced dark theme.

file_operations.description: Update the header layout so the first element is a full-width top banner labeled exactly “Option {slotNumber}”. Use existing design tokens and Tailwind theme colors for outline-only styling (e.g., distinct border colors per slot using token-backed classes). Compose with existing shadcn-ui Button/Badge components (do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Redesign the second line to show selected date with an inline, icon-first variance badge; variance value should be secondary and revealed via tooltip or secondary styling.
acceptanceCriteria: The second line shows the formatted selected date and a compact clock-icon variance indicator inline next to it.
The variance indicator is styled as a badge/pill with its own background or contrasting styling consistent with existing tokens.
The variance value is not presented as the primary large text; it is revealed via a tooltip or clearly secondary text styling.

file_operations.description: Change the date/variance presentation to a single inline row where the date is primary and the variance indicator is a compact pill/badge that is icon-first (Clock). Make the variance value visually secondary (e.g., smaller, muted) and reveal the full variance meaning via a tooltip mechanism (native title attribute or an existing shadcn tooltip component if already available—without modifying ui components). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Place the “Change” button inline on the same row as the date and variance indicator within each compare slot header.
acceptanceCriteria: The “Change” button is on the same row as the date and variance indicator in each slot header.
The layout remains stable and readable across common viewport sizes (no overlapping; sensible wrapping if needed).

file_operations.description: Adjust the header’s flex layout so the “Change” button is inline on the same row as the date + variance indicator (not on a separate line), with responsive wrapping behavior that avoids overlap at narrow widths. Keep using composed shadcn-ui Button styles and avoid editing frontend/src/components/ui. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
